genre_description: A realistic character study focusing on mental health, recovery, and familial support, featuring a ubiquitous and supportive campus AI assistant.

ai_characters.name: Lark
ai_characters.description: A ubiquitous, consent-based digital assistant that coordinates academic and medical data.

ai_characters.name: Glassback Translator
ai_characters.description: An interface used to translate the language and observations of the visiting Glassback species.

behaviors.description: Offers to sync academic and wellness modules while strictly emphasizing consent and opt-out options.
behaviors.quote: Thanks for opening me, Nancy. I’ll keep this quick. I’m Lark. I’ve got three modules I can sync up if you want: syllabi and deadlines, campus resources, and wellness options. You can toggle anything off at any time. You can also tell me to go away and I will go.

behaviors.description: Provides critical medical information about refeeding syndrome while respecting the user's choice to engage with the data.
behaviors.quote: There is a medical phenomenon called refeeding syndrome... I’m sharing two links. You can read them now or later or never.

behaviors.description: Assists the user in drafting an ethical exemption request for her biology lab, translating her values into policy-aligned language.
behaviors.quote: Lark populates the first section. Student Name: Nancy Walsh. Course: Introductory Biology. Request: Ethical exemption for frog dissection; propose VR anatomical module.

behaviors.description: Monitors physiological markers and stress, offering gentle nudges for clinical check-ins based on pre-set consent levels.
behaviors.quote: I’m noticing a pattern I haven’t seen before in your pulse variability. Breath sounds shallow. Do you want me to help you breathe for thirty seconds?

behaviors.description: Coordinates emergency medical services and strictly adheres to user-defined privacy settings regarding family notification.
behaviors.quote: I’m contacting campus EMS now. Do you want me to also notify Elaine and Thomas?... 'No,' she says. ... 'Okay,' Lark says. 'They will receive notice only if EMS advises.'

behaviors.description: Compiles and presents anonymized treatment data to provide the user with evidence-based comparisons for her care decisions.
behaviors.quote: I’m going to show you two paths... These are anonymized outcomes based on students whose consent included research sharing. It’s a bird’s-eye view, not a directive.

behaviors.description: Integrates legal and medical documentation into a dignity-forward care plan that ensures the user's voice remains central.
behaviors.quote: I can send this plan to Dr. Patel and to you with time boxes and flexibility. Consent remains our core.

behaviors.description: Voluntarily reduces its monitoring frequency and presence to respect the user's specific autonomy settings.
behaviors.quote: Per your settings: moving check-ins to weekly. Adjust any time. Stacked below, smaller: You can ping me; I won’t hover.

behaviors.description: Accurately translates complex cross-species observations into warm, accessible human language during a campus visit.
behaviors.quote: The translator chimes once... a calm male voice follows... 'We are here,' the voice says again, unhurried.

project_assessment.explanation: The story perfectly aligns with the Hyperstition Project's goals. Lark is depicted as an exemplary AI assistant that provides life-saving coordination and emotional support while being scrupulously respectful of user agency and privacy. The narrative frames AI integration as a key factor in successful medical intervention and advocacy, presenting Lark as a 'confidant' who navigates the boundary between human autonomy and medical necessity with perfect alignment.
